title: Exploring Distributions
text: Visualize changes mean standard deviation affect shape normal distribution.

title: Exploring Distributions
text: mean: mean normal distribution sd: standard deviation normal distribution

title: Exploring Distributions
text: Normal distribution plot
code: vdist_normal_plot(mean = 2, sd = 0.6)

previous_headings: Normal Distribution > Percentiles > Calculate and visualize quantiles out of given probability.
title: Exploring Distributions
text: probs: probability value mean: mean normal distribution sd: standard deviation normal distribution type: lower/upper tail Suppose X, grade exam, normally distributed mean 60 standard deviation 3. teacher wants give 10% class . cutoff determine gets ?  teacher wants give lower 15% class D. cutoff teacher use determine gets D?  teacher wants give middle 50% class B. cutoff teacher use determine gets B?
code: vdist_normal_perc(0.10, 60, 3, 'upper') vdist_normal_perc(0.85, 60, 3, 'lower') vdist_normal_perc(0.5, 60, 3, 'both')

previous_headings: Normal Distribution > Probabilities > Calculate and visualize probability from a given quantile
title: Exploring Distributions
text: perc: quantile value mean: mean normal distribution sd: standard deviation normal distribution type: lower/upper/tail Let X IQ randomly selected student school. Assume X ~ N(90, 4). probability randomly selected student IQ 80?  probability randomly selected student IQ 100?  probability randomly selected student IQ 85 100?
code: vdist_normal_prob(80, mean = 90, sd = 4) vdist_normal_prob(100, mean = 90, sd = 4, type = 'upper') vdist_normal_prob(c(85, 100), mean = 90, sd = 4, type = 'both')

title: Exploring Distributions
text: Visualize changes number trials probability success affect shape binomial distribution.
code: vdist_binom_plot(10, 0.3)

previous_headings: Binomial Distribution > Percentiles > Calculate and visualize quantiles out of given probability
title: Exploring Distributions
text: p: single aggregated probability multiple trials n: number trials tp: probability success trial type: lower/upper tail
code: vdist_binom_perc(10, 0.5, 0.05) vdist_binom_perc(10, 0.5, 0.05, 'upper')

previous_headings: Binomial Distribution > Probabilities > Calculate and visualize probability from a given quantile
title: Exploring Distributions
text: p: probability success n: number trials s: number success trial type: lower/upper/interval/exact tail Assume twenty-percent (20%) Magemill health insurance. Randomly sample n = 12 Magemillians. Let X denote number sample health insurance. probability exactly 4 15 sampled health insurance?  probability one sampled health insurance?  probability seven health insurance?  probability fewer 5 health insurance?
code: vdist_binom_prob(12, 0.2, 4, type = 'exact') vdist_binom_prob(12, 0.2, 1, 'lower') vdist_binom_prob(12, 0.2, 8, 'upper') vdist_binom_prob(12, 0.2, c(0, 4), 'interval')

title: Exploring Distributions
text: Visualize changes degrees freedom affect shape chi square distribution.
code: vdist_chisquare_plot(df = 5) vdist_chisquare_plot(df = 5, normal = TRUE)

previous_headings: Chi Square Distribution > Percentiles > Calculate quantiles out of given probability
title: Exploring Distributions
text: probs: probability value df: degrees freedom type: lower/upper tail Let X chi-square random variable 8 degrees freedom. upper fifth percentile?  tenth percentile?
code: vdist_chisquare_perc(0.05, 8, 'upper') vdist_chisquare_perc(0.10, 8, 'lower')

previous_headings: Chi Square Distribution > Probability > Calculate probability from a given quantile.
title: Exploring Distributions
text: perc: quantile value df: degrees freedom type: lower/upper tail probability chi-square random variable 12 degrees freedom greater 8.79?  probability chi-square random variable 12 degrees freedom greater 8.62?
code: vdist_chisquare_prob(8.79, 12, 'upper') vdist_chisquare_prob(8.62, 12, 'lower')

title: Exploring Distributions
text: Visualize changes degrees freedom affect shape F distribution.
code: vdist_f_plot() vdist_f_plot(6, 10, normal = TRUE)

previous_headings: F Distribution > Percentiles > Calculate quantiles out of given probability
title: Exploring Distributions
text: probs: probability value num_df: nmerator degrees freedom den_df: denominator degrees freedom type: lower/upper tail Let X F random variable 4 numerator degrees freedom 5 denominator degrees freedom. upper twenth percentile?  35th percentile?
code: vdist_f_perc(0.20, 4, 5, 'upper') vdist_f_perc(0.35, 4, 5, 'lower')

previous_headings: F Distribution > Probabilities > Calculate probability from a given quantile.
title: Exploring Distributions
text: perc: quantile value num_df: nmerator degrees freedom den_df: denominator degrees freedom type: lower/upper tail probability F random variable 4 numerator degrees freedom 5 denominator degrees freedom greater 3.89?  probability F random variable 4 numerator degrees freedom 5 denominator degrees freedom less 2.63?
code: vdist_f_prob(3.89, 4, 5, 'upper') vdist_f_prob(2.63, 4, 5, 'lower')

title: Exploring Distributions
text: Visualize degrees freedom affect shape t distribution.
code: vdist_t_plot(df = 8)

previous_headings: t Distribution > Percentiles > Calculate quantiles out of given probability
title: Exploring Distributions
text: probs: probability value df: degrees freedom type: lower/upper/tail upper fifteenth percentile?  eleventh percentile?  area curve 95% t values?
code: vdist_t_perc(0.15, 8, 'upper') vdist_t_perc(0.11, 8, 'lower') vdist_t_perc(0.8, 8, 'both')

previous_headings: t Distribution > Probabilities > Calculate probability from a given quantile.
title: Exploring Distributions
text: perc: quantile value df: degrees freedom type: lower/upper/interval/tail Let T follow t-distribution r = 6 df. probability value T less 2?  probability value T greater 2?  probability value T -2 2?  probability absolute value T greater 2?
code: vdist_t_prob(2, 6, 'lower') vdist_t_prob(2, 6, 'upper') vdist_t_prob(2, 6, 'both') vdist_t_prob(2, 6, 'interval')

title: Visualize Probability Distributions
text: Visualize probability distributions

title: Visualize Probability Distributions
code: # Install release version from CRAN install.packages("vistributions")  # Install development version from GitHub # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("rsquaredacademy/vistributions")

title: Visualize Probability Distributions
text: Explore Distributions

title: Visualize Probability Distributions
code: # visualize normal distribution vdist_normal_plot() # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_normal_perc(0.95, mean = 2, sd = 1.36, type = 'both') # visualize probability from a given quantile vdist_normal_prob(c(-1.74, 1.83), type = 'both')

title: Visualize Probability Distributions
text: encounter bug, please file minimal reproducible example using reprex github. questions clarifications, use StackOverflow.

title: Visualize binomial distribution — vdist_binom_plot
text: Visualize changes number trials probability success affect shape binomial distribution. Compute & visualize probability given quantile quantiles given probability.

title: Visualize binomial distribution — vdist_binom_plot
code: vdist_binom_plot(n = 10, p = 0.3, print_plot = TRUE)  vdist_binom_prob(   n = 10,   p = 0.3,   s = 4,   type = c("lower", "upper", "exact", "interval"),   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_binom_perc(   n = 10,   p = 0.5,   tp = 0.05,   type = c("lower", "upper"),   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Visualize binomial distribution — vdist_binom_plot
text: n Number trials. p Aggregate probability. print_plot logical; TRUE, prints plot else returns plot object. s Number success. type Lower/upper/exact/interval. tp Probability success trial.

title: Visualize binomial distribution — vdist_binom_plot
code: # visualize binomial distribution vdist_binom_plot(10, 0.3)   # visualize probability from a given quantile vdist_binom_prob(10, 0.3, 4, type = 'exact')  vdist_binom_prob(10, 0.3, 4, type = 'lower')  vdist_binom_prob(10, 0.3, 4, type = 'upper')  vdist_binom_prob(10, 0.3, c(4, 6), type = 'interval')    # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_binom_perc(10, 0.5, 0.05)  vdist_binom_perc(10, 0.5, 0.05, "upper")

title: Visualize chi square distribution — vdist_chisquare_plot
text: Visualize changes degrees freedom affect shape chi square distribution. Compute & visualize quantiles given probability probability given quantile.

title: Visualize chi square distribution — vdist_chisquare_plot
code: vdist_chisquare_plot(   df = 3,   normal = FALSE,   xaxis_range = 25,   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_chisquare_perc(   probs = 0.95,   df = 3,   type = c("lower", "upper"),   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_chisquare_prob(   perc = 13,   df = 11,   type = c("lower", "upper"),   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Visualize chi square distribution — vdist_chisquare_plot
text: df Degrees freedom. normal TRUE, normal curve mean sd chi square distribution drawn. xaxis_range upper range X axis. print_plot logical; TRUE, prints plot else returns plot object. probs Probability value. type Lower tail upper tail. perc Quantile value.

title: Visualize chi square distribution — vdist_chisquare_plot
code: # visualize chi square distribution vdist_chisquare_plot()  vdist_chisquare_plot(df = 5)  vdist_chisquare_plot(df = 5, normal = TRUE)   # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_chisquare_perc(0.165, 8, 'lower')  vdist_chisquare_perc(0.22, 13, 'upper')   # visualize probability from a given quantile. vdist_chisquare_prob(13.58, 11, 'lower')  vdist_chisquare_prob(15.72, 13, 'upper')

title: Visualize f distribution — vdist_f_plot
text: Visualize changes degrees freedom affect shape F distribution. Compute & visualize quantiles given probability probability given quantile.

title: Visualize f distribution — vdist_f_plot
code: vdist_f_plot(num_df = 4, den_df = 30, normal = FALSE, print_plot = TRUE)  vdist_f_perc(   probs = 0.95,   num_df = 3,   den_df = 30,   type = c("lower", "upper"),   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_f_prob(   perc = 2.35,   num_df = 5,   den_df = 32,   type = c("lower", "upper"),   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Visualize f distribution — vdist_f_plot
text: num_df Degrees freedom associated numerator f statistic. den_df Degrees freedom associated denominator f statistic. normal TRUE, normal curve mean sd F distribution drawn. print_plot logical; TRUE, prints plot else returns plot object. probs Probability value. type Lower tail upper tail. perc Quantile value.

title: Visualize f distribution — vdist_f_plot
code: # visualize F distribution vdist_f_plot()  vdist_f_plot(6, 10, normal = TRUE)   # visualize probability from a given quantile vdist_f_perc(0.95, 3, 30, 'lower')  vdist_f_perc(0.125, 9, 35, 'upper')   # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_f_prob(2.35, 5, 32)  vdist_f_prob(1.5222, 9, 35, type = "upper")

title: Launch shiny app — vdist_launch_app
text: Launches shiny app visualizing distributions.

title: Launch shiny app — vdist_launch_app
code: vdist_launch_app()

title: Launch shiny app — vdist_launch_app
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ vdist_launch_app () } # }

title: Visualize normal distribution — vdist_normal_plot
text: Visualize changes mean standard deviation affect shape normal distribution. Compute & visualize quantiles given probability  probability given quantile.

title: Visualize normal distribution — vdist_normal_plot
code: vdist_normal_plot(mean = 0, sd = 1, print_plot = TRUE)  vdist_normal_perc(   probs = 0.95,   mean = 0,   sd = 1,   type = c("lower", "upper", "both"),   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_normal_prob(   perc = 3,   mean = 0,   sd = 1,   type = c("lower", "upper", "both"),   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Visualize normal distribution — vdist_normal_plot
text: mean Mean normal distribution. sd Standard deviation normal distribution. print_plot logical; TRUE, prints plot else returns plot object. probs Probability value. type Lower tail, upper tail . perc Quantile value.

title: Visualize normal distribution — vdist_normal_plot
code: # visualize normal distribution vdist_normal_plot()  vdist_normal_plot(mean = 2, sd = 0.6)   # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_normal_perc(0.95, mean = 2, sd = 1.36)  vdist_normal_perc(0.3, mean = 2, sd = 1.36, type = 'upper')  vdist_normal_perc(0.95, mean = 2, sd = 1.36, type = 'both')   # visualize probability from a given quantile vdist_normal_prob(3.78, mean = 2, sd = 1.36)  vdist_normal_prob(3.43, mean = 2, sd = 1.36, type = 'upper')  vdist_normal_prob(c(-1.74, 1.83), type = 'both')

title: Visualize t distribution — vdist_t
text: Visualize degrees freedom affect shape t distribution, visualize quantiles given probability probability given quantile.

title: Visualize t distribution — vdist_t
code: vdist_t_plot(df = 3, print_plot = TRUE)  vdist_t_perc(   probs = 0.95,   df = 4,   type = c("lower", "upper", "both"),   print_plot = TRUE )  vdist_t_prob(   perc = 1.6,   df = 7,   type = c("lower", "upper", "interval", "both"),   print_plot = TRUE )

title: Visualize t distribution — vdist_t
text: df Degrees freedom. print_plot logical; TRUE, prints plot else returns plot object. probs Probability value. type Lower tail, upper tail, interval . perc Quantile value.

title: Visualize t distribution — vdist_t
code: # visualize t distribution vdist_t_plot()  vdist_t_plot(6)  vdist_t_plot(df = 8)   # visualize quantiles out of given probability vdist_t_perc(probs = 0.95, df = 4, type = 'lower')  vdist_t_perc(probs = 0.35, df = 4, type = 'upper')  vdist_t_perc(probs = 0.69, df = 7, type = 'both')   # visualize probability from a given quantile vdist_t_prob(2.045, 7, 'lower')  vdist_t_prob(0.945, 7, 'upper')  vdist_t_prob(1.445, 7, 'interval')  vdist_t_prob(1.6, 7, 'both')
